name: Magic Piano Tiles 4 Marshmello DJ
description:
Challenge your reflexes and improve your reaction speed and musical skills and
play Marshmello piano songs!

Magic Piano Tiles 4 Marshmello is :

- Play your favorite DJ songs
- Create beautiful melodies
- play piano covers of Marshmello songs
- Challenge your reflexes and reaction time
- Increase your game speed to win more points

Rule of the game :

It's very simple, just tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles. That's all !

Try out this music game now and improve your reaction speed and musical skill!


Playlist:

- Marshmello x Anne-marie friends
- Happier Marshmello
- Marshmello tell me
- I Need You(BTS)
- Love yourself (BTS)
- A Comme Amour (Richard Clayderman)
- Hungarian sonata (Richard Clayderman)
And More ...



AVERTISSEMENT:
This game is an unofficial fan application.
He is not affiliated or endorsed by Marshmello , or his label.
This application does not include any copyrighted material.
The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes.
For entertainment purposes only.
